驗.definition: to examine; to test; to check

驗傷.definition: to examine a wound or injury (typically for forensic purposes)

驗定.definition: to come to a conclusion about sth after examining it; to assay

驗方.definition: a tried and tested medical prescription

驗明.definition: to ascertain; to identify; to verify (sb's identity etc)

驗明正身.definition: to identify; to verify sb's identity; identification

驗核.definition: to check; to examine; to inspect

驗算.definition: to verify a calculation; a double-check

驗血.definition: to do a blood test; to have one's blood tested

驗證.definition: to inspect and verify; experimental verification; to validate (a theory); to authenticate

驗證碼.definition: verification code; CAPTCHA, a type of challenge-response test (computing)

驗資.definition: capital verification; certification of registered capital

驗鈔器.definition: money counter and counterfeit detection machine

驗鈔機.definition: a device used to check money and detect counterfeit bills
